Ich liebe das Spiel, das beste was ich je gespielt habe. Ich wünschte es gäbe noch einen dritten Teil, dieser hier ist so gut gemacht und die Story ist ziemlich spannend. Die Atmosphäre ist einfach genial. Kann ich jedem empfehlen!

This game is just as amazing as the first game. Bought the first game and the sequel in the bundle. Both games are worth it. Very story rich series, very fun mechanics. Please buy the bundle and get the first Portal game plus the sequel. Very good series despite the age. I recommend both games.

Игра очень интересная, и мне очень понравился сюжет. Вы играете за главную героиню (Chell) и проходите уровни разгадывая головоломки с помощю портальной пушки игра дает большое развитие ума а так же есть мультиплеер
(корпоратив,совместная игра) и мне кажется игра стоит своих денег (с скидкой:D) А ТАК ЖЕ ГАБЕН СДЕЛАЙ УЖЕ 3 ЧАСТЬ ПОЖАЛУЙСТА игра супер всем советую (советую не смотреть споллеры,да понимаю это сложно но вы почуствуете РАДОСТЬ то что вы до конца прошли её p.s а так же после конца игры вы начнете полюбому заходить в ютуб и искать пасхалки

Portal 2

Must buy for anyone who like first person games. 
The puzzles, the story and the amazing comedy will keep you engaged for hours and you will get so invested with all of the characters you won't want to stop playing.
Also, the multiplayer is so much fun to play with friends and the shenanigans that you both will get up to is endless entertainment.
Portal 2 is an iconic game that greatly improves on what its predecessor (Portal) did. 
Buy this game for yourself or buy it for a friend and enjoy!
it is good  the classic portal strats and more.

I have played the original Portal countless times but never Portal 2. I bought this the other day and just beat it. This game is truly a work of art and will go down as one of my all time favorite games.

aged really well, a game changer game at the time. would recommend anyone even years after release to play it

Very good gameplay.

Ich fand schon den ersten Teil cool und hab eigentlich auch mal ne Beta-Version gespielt .. lässt sich zwar nicht mehr in meiner Bibliothek finden, aber das ist hierfür nicht wichtig :)
Portal 2 ist in meinen Augen eine gelungene Fortsetzung mit durchaus kniffligen Rätseln, bei denen die Sprüche und der Charme aus dem Vorgänger nicht verloren gehen .. Hinzu kommt der Koop-Modus mit eigener Geschichte, bei dem die Köpfe zu zweit rauchen können und die Communitytestkammern um "selbst-kreierte" Level aus den Workshops zu lösen. 

Somit ist für jede menge Rätselspaß gesorgt.. von mir gibt's ne klare Kaufempfehlung!
Pretty gay, good if you like twinks and moms
aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa

Despite me being quite terrible at this game, it has to be one of my favourite games I've ever played. Everything from the gameplay to the voice acting is phenomenal in this game, and I can even run it at 60 fps on my crappy computer. The characters are some of the best written ones I have seen in any digital media, which is made even better by the amazing voice acting. I highly, HIGHLY recommend this for anyone who likes a good challenge, right after you finish the first game of course.

portals
eeee

Portal 2 is one of those games where it can be hard at times, but you really want to continue to see what happens next. The editor is very nice, but it dosn't have everything I would like (Crushers, triggers, and-gates, other stuff like that) but it still can be used to make really cool puzzles. The story, (Spoiler warning) while I wish that Wheatley didn't get trapped in space at the end, is so interesting, and this game really builds on GlaDOS's personality, and introduces a lovable robot AI, who makes the game much less lonley. The comedy in it is one of the funniest parts about it, and I would highly recommend playing this game
One of the greatest games of  all time. Story, Characters mechanics are incredible.
